title: Drawing of Lux Final Spark for some Riot Points
body: I was wondering if some poros could help me out... I need 66 RP for a key and a chest and it would be nice if I could get the 66 RP for this drawing. I'm not a very good artist but I gave it a shot. Have a nice day.

replies.body:
Yoooooo lookit all them colors!

This is most def worth 66 RP, be sure to refresh your client if you don't see it added ^_^
